description:
Even though it happens in mere seconds, an accident can have a lifelong impact. Accident victims often experience life-changing, career-ending, and sometimes fatal injuries. Often, personal injuries victims are left with physical pain and emotional devastation. These traumatic events require a lawyer who is prepared to fight for maximum compensation available. If you have been injured, talking with an attorney is critical.

At The Carlson Law Firm, we've been protecting the rights of accident survivors and their families since 1976.

We employ more than 40 lawyers in 12 locations throughout the state of Texas, including an office in Austin. Our highly-skilled Austin trial attorneys are experienced advocates who share our firm's commitment to client service. Our attorneys are accessible for clients and work tirelessly to discover legal options they never thought they had.

The Carlson Law Firm provides the personalized representation that you would expect from a small firm, but with the benefit of a large network of experienced professionals, including investigators, former police officers, legal nurses, medical experts, crash scene experts and other knowledgeable staff members.

At The Carlson Law Firm, we have the resources necessary to maximize compensation through settlement or, if necessary, courtroom litigation. Our attorneys spend time with each client to identify negligent acts and assess the impact of those acts on the client and his or her family. Injured residents of Austin and those throughout the Lone Star state can feel at ease, knowing we've got their back

Carlson Law Firm clients can rest assured that their rights will be fiercely protected from their initial free consultation to the final resolution of their personal injury cases.

Similar to our other locations throughout Texas, the Austin office is conveniently located and offers free parking. If you are unable to make it to one of our offices, Carlson Law Firm staff members will come to you, wherever you may be.
